snippet: PLATONI--Nora Barilli, of the Bronx, on February 10, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Bruno Platoni, loving mother of Richard, of the Bronx and Michael (Mary Ryan-Platoni), of Bronxville. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son, Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 2 to 5pm Thursday. Mass of Christian Burial, St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville, on Friday, February 12 at 9:45am. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the St. Jude Children's Hospital, Stjude.org. 1/3
